title: Complete Help Command Testing Results
details:
**Comprehensive Help Command Testing Results** - All tests performed on June 16, 2025

## Summary
✅ **ALL HELP COMMANDS WORKING CORRECTLY** - After fixing the global help interception issue in Program.cs, all help commands now display proper help information.

## Root Command
✅ `na --help` - Shows comprehensive application help with environment information and all available commands

## Tag Commands
✅ `na tag --help` - Shows tag management subcommands (8 subcommands available)
✅ `na tag add-nested --help` - Shows specific add-nested command help with arguments and options
✅ `na tag update-frontmatter --help` - Shows specific update-frontmatter command help with three arguments
